tldr: The `iron` crate is no longer maintained, as indicated by the developer. Its last commit documents that `iron` has served its purpose and will no longer receive updates.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using this package.
how_to_fix: Remove any `iron` package from your application. Please take a look at this comparison for popular alternatives.
vulnerable_to: Use of Unmaintained Third Party Components
